name: Invite member of organization to project via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization.

### Verify that:

- User can invite member of organization to project.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization.

Verify that:

  • User can invite member of organization to project.
